item.title: My Experience in Summer of Bitcoin 2022
item.description: What is Summer of Bitcoin? a global, online summer internship program focused on introducing university students to bitcoin open-source development and design When I started to write my proposal for it, there was only one week to go before the deadline. Luckily, my experience with OSS-Fuzz and my efforts paid off. I am proud to become one of the 83 students who will participate in Summer of Bitcoin 2022 and contribute to Bitcoin Core under the guidance of Marco Falke.
